apps.name: Sokoban (Boxman) Classic
apps.introduce: Classic Sokoban puzzle game, with 306 mentally stimulating levels.
apps.description: Boxman is a free implementation of the classic box-pushing puzzle game with 306 free to play levels. Enjoy!

apps.name: Sokoban Gianta
apps.introduce: Box pushing puzzle game, with a giant mentally stimulating level.
apps.description: Sokoban Gianta is an implementation of the classic box-pushing puzzle game with a single giant level. Enjoy!

apps.name: Sokoban (Boxman) Collection
apps.introduce: Box pushing puzzle game, with 654 collection levels.
apps.description: Sokoban (Boxman) Collection is a free implementation of the classic box-pushing puzzle game with 654 free to play levels. Enjoy!.

apps.name: Sokoban (Boxman) Watch
apps.introduce: Sokoban (Boxman) Watch for Wear OS is an implementation of the classic box-pushing puzzle game.
apps.description: Sokoban (Boxman) Watch for Wear OS is an implementation of the classic box-pushing puzzle game with 352 free to play levels. Enjoy!.
